channel.title: Help! How to change the name of PK points!
channel.description: Hi, I wanna change the the price of the items that require PK points, and also change the name of it, if anyone can help me or point me in the right direction it would be of great appreciation and thanks!

item.title: Help! How to change the name of PK points!
item.dc:creator: @strd3stroyer strd3stroyer
item.description:
@strd3stroyer wrote:

people have explained the name changing but not the pricing.
In shopassistant.java

Search for the item ID you want, it’ll look like this
(I used D Claws)
case 14484:
return 500;

change the Return to the amount of points you want it to be.

Enjoy, It’s really quite easy…

Read full topic
item.source: Help! How to change the name of PK points!

item.title: Help! How to change the name of PK points!
item.dc:creator: @tyb97 tyb97
item.description:
@tyb97 wrote:

Yes but if you got rid of pk points, and changed it, playersaves wouldnt recognize it and it wouldNt save the points you made.

item.title: Help! How to change the name of PK points!
item.dc:creator: @baddy351 baddy351
item.description:
@baddy351 wrote:

No, you are not doing this the right way. It doesnt change in the playersaves, you just change the name of the token, and what calls upon that token.

Read full topic

item.title: Help! How to change the name of PK points!
item.dc:creator: @tyb97 tyb97
item.description:
@tyb97 wrote:

modzilla:

ctrl + f search pk points and change it all to what ever you would like or search in the search bar in your source folder

Yeah, but just go into your server folder, and use the search bar, and search for pk points, and look for the file that contains them, but be aware also, you must change it in player saves and all that.

Read full topic
